SOUTHERN ADRIATIC SEA.
STRAIT OF OTRANTO.
VESSEL, EIGHT PERSONS ON BOARD, UNREPORTED.
LAST KNOWN POSITION VICINITY 40-00N 019-00E.
VESSELS IN VICINITY REQUESTED TO KEEP A SHARP
LOOKOUT, ASSIST IF POSSIBLE. REPORTS
TO MRCC ROME, INMARSAT-C: 424744220,
PHONE: 39 065 908 4527, 39 065 908 4527,
FAX: 390 6592 2737, 390 5908 4409,
E-MAIL: ITMRCC@MIT.GOV.IT.
